author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

Modernize DropBox Metadata producer
 * Some restructuring so that data files are under \data, test is under \test and the main plugin is under \plugins, also merged the header into the main file
 * Added a new unit test that produces the Dropbox metadata sqlite file
 * Add a Reader config that reads the newly produced sqlite file (and can read from GT too)
 * Changed to the new method of the PoolDBOutputService and so changed the pointer to an instance
 * Move away from cout to LogInfo
 * Move to a `one` module
 * migrate away from ES get() function

#### PR validation:

`scramv1 b runtests` with the new unit test runs fine

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A

part of https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/28
(and other migration campaigns)
title: Modernize DropBox Metadata producer
